meta.title: Privacy Policy - How Smail Protects User Data Security and Privacy
meta.description: View Smail temporary email's detailed privacy policy to understand data collection, usage, and protection measures. We promise 24-hour automatic email deletion, no storage of user personal information, SSL encrypted transmission, and comprehensive privacy protection.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Here is our privacy protection policy

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: What information we collect and how we use it

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Temporary email addresses (automatically generated by system)
IP addresses (used only for security monitoring)

provided.title: User-Provided Information
items: Personal information provided through contact forms

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.description: How we use the collected information

items.label: Service provision:
items.value: Provide temporary email services and display received emails

items.label: Service improvement:
items.value: Analyze usage patterns to improve our service quality

items.label: Security protection:
items.value: Detect and prevent abuse, spam, and security threats

items.label: Customer support:
items.value: Respond to your questions and provide technical support

items.label: Legal compliance:
items.value: Comply with applicable legal and regulatory requirements

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.description: How we protect your data security

technical.title: Technical Protection Measures
items: All data transmission uses SSL/TLS encryption
Servers use firewalls and intrusion detection systems
Regular security audits and vulnerability scans

access.title: Access Control
items: Employees required to sign confidentiality agreements

items.label: Email content:
items.value: Automatically deleted after temporary mailbox expiration (usually 24 hours)

items.label: Access logs:
items.value: Retained for 30 days for security monitoring

items.label: Contact information:
items.value: User-provided contact information retained for 2 years

items.label: System logs:
items.value: Retained for 90 days for troubleshooting

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: Whether we share your information with third parties
sharing.content: We promise not to sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties. We may share information in the following circumstances:

items.label: Legal requirements:
items.value: When required by law or government agencies

items.label: Service providers:
items.value: With trusted third parties who help us operate our services (such as cloud service providers)

items.label: Security protection:
items.value: To protect our rights, property, or safety, as well as the safety of users and the public

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: Rights you have regarding your personal information

items.label: Access right:
items.value: You have the right to know what information we collect and process about you

items.label: Correction right:
items.value: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal information

items.label: Deletion right:
items.value: You have the right to request deletion of your personal information

items.label: Processing restriction right:
items.value: In certain circumstances, you have the right to restrict our processing of your information

items.label: Complaint right:
items.value: You have the right to file complaints with relevant regulatory authorities

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your user experience:

items.label: Essential cookies:
items.value: Used to maintain your mailbox session

items.label: Analytics cookies:
items.value: Help us understand website usage (anonymous)

items.label: Functional cookies:
items.value: Remember your preference settings

cookies.control: You can control cookie usage through your browser settings.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be prominently notified on our website. Continued use of our services indicates your acceptance of the updated privacy policy.
updates.content2: We recommend regularly reviewing this page to stay informed about the latest privacy protection information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: How to contact us about privacy issues
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through:
items: Contact form: Through our contact page
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 48 hours.

cta.title: Use Our Service with Confidence
cta.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy, allowing you to use our temporary email service with peace of mind
